title: The DJI Power 2000 power station has never been cheaper at Amazon - save $600 right now

title: Ringgit climbs to 3.92 vs US dollar ahead of Malaysia's GDP data
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The ringgit revisited the 3.92 level to end higher against the US dollar on Tuesday, as investors took positions ahead of the release of Malaysia's gross domestic product (GDP) data on Friday.
